mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_weibo_sina_userinfo( userId, idstr, screen_name, name, province, city, location, description, url, profile_image_url, profile_url, domain, weihao, gender, followers_count, friends_count, statuses_count, favourites_count, created_at, following, allow_all_act_msg, geo_enabled, verified, verified_type, remark, status, allow_all_comment, avatar_large, avatar_hd, verified_reason, follow_me, online_status, bi_followers_count, lang ) VALUES ( #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idstr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{screen_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{province,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{city,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{location,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{profile_image_url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{profile_url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{domain,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{weihao,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{followers_count,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{friends_count,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{statuses_count,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{favourites_count,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{created_at,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{following,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{allow_all_act_msg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{geo_enabled,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{verified,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{verified_type,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{allow_all_comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{avatar_large,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{avatar_hd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{verified_reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{follow_me,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{online_status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{bi_followers_count,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{lang,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
